compatibility.notes: The VOSTROM license is permissive and allows for integration with other permissive licenses without imposing restrictions. However, care should be taken when combining with copyleft licenses.

key_requirements: Accept the entire risk of possession, use, and performance of the Distribution.
Ensure that modifications are compliant with the terms of this license.
license.name: VOSTROM
obligations: Distribute modified versions with source code and documentation.
Label modified versions with an identifier of origin.
Retain copyright management information in all versions.
Do not use proprietary materials that cannot be released under this license for modifications.
Obtain prior written permission to use the name of VOSTROM in advertising or publicity.
